Tips: If you installed Waydroid first and then the runner, it is recommended to follow this order for better use of Waydroid:
3. Enable clipboard interoperability with Linux host system
4. Set language to your preferred language, then start Session and execute subsequent steps
6. Disable automatic screen rotation for fullscreen windows in multi-window mode (skip if you have a 2-in-1 device)
You can also use Menu Bar -> Waydroid -> One-click Optimize Waydroid
Tips_zh: 如果您是先在安装Waydroid然后安装运行器的,推荐按照以下顺序操作以更好地使用 Waydroid：
1. 安装 Libhoudini（二进制翻译器）
3. 开启剪切板与Linux主系统互通功能
4. 设置语言为中文/简体,然后启动Session,执行后续步骤
6. 禁用多窗口下全屏窗口屏幕自动旋转(如果您是二合一本可以跳过)
也可以在 菜单栏->Waydroid->一键优化Waydroid 处理
